sourcesContent:
const styles = {
  container: {
    display: "flex",
    flexDirection: "column",
    alignItems: "center",
    justifyContent: "center",
    minHeight: "100vh",
    width: "100vw",
    backgroundColor: "#1a202c", // Dark navy blue background
    padding: "20px",
    color: "#f6e58d", // Yellow text
    fontFamily: "'Roboto', sans-serif",
  },
  heading: {
    fontSize: "2.5rem",
    color: "#f6e58d",
    textAlign: "center",
    marginBottom: "20px",
    fontWeight: "bold",
  },
  header: {
    display: "flex",
    flexDirection: "row",
    justifyContent: "space-between",
    alignItems: "center",
    width: "100%",
    marginBottom: "20px",
  },
  statusAndLogout: {
    display: "flex",
    alignItems: "center",
    gap: "15px",
  },
  greeting: {
    fontSize: "1.2rem",
    color: "#f6e58d",
  },
  notificationContainer: {
    position: "relative",
  },
  notificationIcon: {
    fontSize: "1.5rem",
    color: "#f6e58d",
    cursor: "pointer",
  },
  notificationMessage: {
    position: "absolute",
    top: "30px",
    right: "0",
    backgroundColor: "#2d3748",
    color: "#f6e58d",
    padding: "10px",
    borderRadius: "5px",
    fontWeight: "bold",
    boxShadow: "0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
  },
  activeStatus: {
    fontSize: "1rem",
    color: "#38a169",
    fontWeight: "bold",
  },
  deactiveStatus: {
    fontSize: "1rem",
    color: "#e53e3e",
    fontWeight: "bold",
  },
  logoutButton: {
    width: "160px",
    height: "40px",
    fontSize: "1rem",
    color: "#f6e58d",
    backgroundColor: "#ff7f50", // Coral button for better contrast
    border: "none",
    borderRadius: "8px",
    cursor: "pointer",
    fontWeight: "bold",
    boxShadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)",
    transition: "transform 0.2s",
  },
  columns: {
    display: "flex",
    justifyContent: "space-around",
    width: "100%",
    marginTop: "20px",
  },
  column: {
    flex: 1,
    margin: "0 15px",
    textAlign: "center",
    color: "#f6e58d",
  },
  deviceListContainer: {
    maxHeight: "300px",
    overflowY: "auto",
    backgroundColor: "#2d3748",
    padding: "10px",
    borderRadius: "8px",
  },
  deviceItem: {
    backgroundColor: "#4a5568",
    color: "#f6e58d", // Yellow text for better visibility
    padding: "15px",
    margin: "10px 0",
    borderRadius: "8px",
    display: "flex",
    alignItems: "center",
    gap: "10px",
    boxShadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)",
  },
  actionButton: {
    width: "160px",
    height: "40px",
    fontSize: "1rem",
    color: "#f6e58d",
    backgroundColor: "#ff7f50", // Coral button
    border: "none",
    borderRadius: "8px",
    cursor: "pointer",
    fontWeight: "bold",
    margin: "10px",
    boxShadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)",
    transition: "background-color 0.3s",
  },
  contactDetails: {
    marginTop: "40px",
    textAlign: "center",
    fontSize: "1rem",
    color: "#f6e58d", // Yellow text for the footer
    backgroundColor: "#2d3748",
    padding: "10px",
    borderRadius: "8px",
    boxShadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)",
  },
};
export default Landing;
